00062 
00063 class BaseExporter;
00064 
00065 
00066 //=== IMPLEMENTATION ==========================================================
00067 
00068 
00073 class _OMWriter_ : public BaseWriter
00074 {
00075 public:
00076 
00077   // constructor
00078   _OMWriter_();
00079 
00080   std::string get_description() const
00081   { return "OpenMesh Format"; }
00082   
00083   std::string get_extensions() const
00084   { return "om"; }
00085 
00086   bool write(std::ostream&, BaseExporter&, Options) const;
00087 
00088 
00089   size_t binary_size(BaseExporter& _be, Options _opt) const;
00090 
00091 
00092 protected:
00093 
00094   static const OMFormat::uchar magic_[3];
00095   static const OMFormat::uint8 version_;
00096 
00097   bool write(const std::string&, BaseExporter&, Options) const;
00098 
00099   bool write_binary(std::ostream&, BaseExporter&, Options) const;
00100 
00101   size_t store_binary_custom_chunk( std::ostream&, const BaseProperty&,
00102                                     OMFormat::Chunk::Entity, bool) const;
00103 };
